TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CloudFileDirectory extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.File.IListFileItem

Docs.summary: Represents a directory of files, designated by a delimiter character.
Docs.remarks: Shares, which are encapsulated as objects, hold directories, and directories hold files. Directories can also contain sub-directories.
